title: Biden says "it's clear" Russia is targeting civilians, but it's "too early to say" if it's committing war crimes - CNN
content:
1. Biden says "it's clear" Russia is targeting civilians, but it's "too early to say" if it's committing war crimes  CNN
  2. Russia invades Ukraine live updates: The U.N. votes overwhelmingly to condemn Russia's invasion of Ukraine  NPR
  3. Russia-Ukraine war live updates: Kharkiv under fresh attack, Biden says Putin more 'isolated' than ever  NBC News
  4. US vice president says "everything is on the table" as US continues to assess sanctions on Russia  CNN
  5. Live updates: Russia being banned from US airspace  Boston Herald
description: US President Joe Biden said Wednesday that he believes Russia is intentionally targeting civilians in Ukraine but declined to say whether he believed war crimes were being committed.
